violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer name 'Руслан' collected and repeated by operator, but no confirmation requested. City 'Самара' repeated as 'Город Самара' without asking 'Верно?' or receiving explicit confirmation.

violations_detected.title: 5-second intro timing violation
violations_detected.evidence: Operator greeting started at 7.619 seconds, exceeding 5-second threshold

coaching_priorities.recommendation: When collecting contact data (name, city, phone, etc.), must repeat back AND explicitly ask for confirmation: 'Верно?', 'Правильно?', 'Подтверждаете?'
Begin greeting within 5 seconds of call start. Current: 7.6 seconds.

7.1.evidence: Proper greeting with company name (74 колеса), operator name (Ирина), and offer to help. Proper closing with thanks and farewell.

7.2.evidence: Name and city collected and repeated, but confirmation not requested
7.2.note: Operator repeated 'Руслан' and 'Город Самара' but did not ask 'Верно?' for explicit confirmation

6.1.evidence: No critical silence, no customer hangup

9.3.evidence: Operator thanked customer: 'Спасибо за ожидание' immediately after search

3.1.evidence: Specific tire unavailable, operator provided alternatives with detailed explanation. Product unavailability, not operator failure.

3.6.evidence: Operator checked system before providing availability information

5.1.evidence: Comprehensive information provided: delivery details, payment options, promotion, alternatives

10.2.evidence: Logical presentation and proper flow throughout call

10.3.evidence: Customer name used consistently, good rapport, professional dialogue management

10.6.evidence: Complete information about alternatives, delivery, payment, and promotions

2.1.evidence: No call dropout or service refusal

4.1.evidence: Customer was cooperative and polite throughout

positive_observations: Professional and friendly greeting with all required elements
Excellent customer service when product unavailable - offered alternatives with pricing
Thanked customer for waiting after search
Used customer name consistently throughout call
Provided comprehensive information about delivery, payment options, and promotion
Patient and helpful when clarifying customer name (Руслан vs Рустам)
Professional closing with thanks for the call
Good technical knowledge explaining tire matching requirements

data_quality.confidence_notes: Word-level timestamps available for precise echo method detection. Some speaker diarization shows all as 'Agent' but conversation flow is clear from context.
